name: The Official Emoji Bored Game
description:
simple, an offline game where you get to choose an emoji, then role play as the emojij you chose, ie , Crying Out Loud, Laughing Out Loud, Angel, Devil, Anger or Qwerkey. you will be given actions to perform as said emoji, and on completion of those actions you will be awarded coins, the 1st one to 100 coins wins.

For a good time, record ur actions and upload it to tic toc. 

#emojis
